title: Hilary Duff shares first photo on set as Lizzie McGuire
text:
"Lizzie McGuire" fans are anxiously awaiting the arrival of the show's highly anticipated reboot.

The show's star, Hilary Duff, gave fans a sneak peek of what's to come on her Instagram on Tuesday, showing off Lizzie's costume on the first day of production for the new Disney+ series.

"Happy first LIZZIE day!!!!! NYC.....cue the rain 😏 ✌🏻 ☺️ 🎥 #lizziemcguire," she captioned the photo.

The beloved character has definitely updated her wardrobe since the early 2000s. She shows off a trendy matching blazer and skirt set with a bright yellow coat and booties in the photo.

In the new series, Duff's famous character is now a 30-year-old apprentice to a New York City-based interior designer.

The actress recently shared another photo with co-stars Hallie Todd, Robert Carradine and Jake Thomas to announce that the trio will be reprising their roles as Jo, Sam, and Matt McGuire.

"We are standing in what will soon be the McGuire living room. What’s up fam. We doin this #lizziemcguire #disneyplus" she captioned the photo.

We can't wait to see what's in store for the McGuire family!

You can preorder the streaming service at DisneyPlus.com.

Disney is the parent company of ABC News and "Good Morning America."
description: Hilary Duff gave fans yet another sneak peek of what's to come on the highly anticipated reboot of
